channel.title: Lua: news
channel.description: What's happening in the Lua world.

item.title: Lua Workshop 2016 to be held in San Francisco
item.description: The Lua Workshop 2016 will be held in San Francisco, CA, on Oct 13-14, cortesy of Mashape.

item.title: Lua 5.3.2 released
item.description: Lua 5.3.2 has been released. It fixes all known bugs in Lua 5.3.1.

item.title: Lua Workshop 2015 held in Stockholm
item.description: The Lua Workshop 2015 was held in Stockholm, Sweden, courtesy of King.

item.title: Lua 5.3.1 released
item.description: Lua 5.3.1 has been released. It fixes all known bugs in Lua 5.3.0.

item.title: Lua 5.2.4 released
item.description: Lua 5.2.4 has been released. It fixes all known bugs in Lua 5.2.3.

item.title: Lua 5.3.0 is almost here
item.description: We have entered the final release-candidate cycle for Lua 5.3.0.

item.title: Lua 5.3.0 (beta) released
item.description: The beta version of Lua 5.3 has been released for testing.

item.title: Lua Workshop 2014 ends today
item.description: The Lua Workshop 2014, which is being held in Moscow, ends today.

item.title: Lua 5.3.0 (alpha) released
item.description: The alpha version of Lua 5.3 has been released for testing.

item.title: Lua 5.3.0 (work3) released
item.description: The third work version of Lua 5.3 has been released for testing.

item.title: Lua Workshop 2014 to be held in Moscow
item.description: The Lua Workshop 2014 will be held in Moscow, Russia, on September 13-14, 2014.

item.title: Lua 5.3.0 (work2) released
item.description: The second work version of Lua 5.3 has been released for testing.

item.title: Reference manual now available in Portuguese
item.description: The Lua 5.2 reference manual has been translated into Portuguese. O manual de referência de Lua 5.2 foi traduzido para o português.

item.title: Lua 5.2.3 released
item.description: Lua 5.2.3 has been released. It fixes all known bugs in Lua 5.2.2.

item.title: Lua Workshop 2013 held in Toulouse
item.description: Lua Workshop 2013 held in Toulouse, France, as part of Le Capitole du Libre.

item.title: 20 years of Lua
item.description: We commemorate 20 years of the first version of Lua today.

item.title: Roberto receives award for Lua
item.description: Roberto Ierusalimschy, chief architect of Lua, received the Scientific Merit Award of the Brazilian Computer Society for his work on Lua.

item.title: Lua Workshop 2013 to be held in Toulouse
item.description: The Lua Workshop 2013 will be held in Toulouse, France, on November 23-24, 2013, as part of Le Capitole du Libre.

item.title: Programming in Lua now available as an e-book
item.description: The book "Programming in Lua" (3rd edition) is now available as an e-book through Feisty Duck.

item.title: Roberto gives an invited talk at WWW 2013
item.description: Roberto gives an invited talk "Lua versus Javascript: Why do we need multiple languages?" at WWW 2013, the 22nd International World Wide Web Conference.

item.title: Lua 5.2.2 released
item.description: Lua 5.2.2 has been released. It fixes all known bugs in Lua 5.2.1.

item.title: Third edition of "Programming in Lua" published
item.description: The third edition of "Programming in Lua" by Roberto Ierusalimschy has been published.

item.title: Reopened donations via PayPal
item.description: Donations to the Lua project via PayPal are again available.

item.title: Lua Workshop 2012 held at Verisign
item.description: The Lua Workshop 2012 was held at Verisign's headquarters.

item.title: Lua 5.2.1 released
item.description: Lua 5.2.1 has been released. It fixes all known bugs in Lua 5.2.0.

item.title: Lua Workshop 2012 to be held at Verisign
item.description: The Lua Workshop 2012 will be held at Verisign's headquarters in Reston, Virginia, on November 29-30, 2012.

item.title: New LuaJIT mailing list
item.description: LuaJIT now has its own mailing list, dedicated to announcements, discussions, bug reports or feature requests.

item.title: Lua store opens at Fibers
item.description: You can help to spread the word about Lua by buying Lua T-shirts at Fibers. Use Lua, wear Lua!

item.title: Initial plans for the Lua Workshop 2012
item.description: We have started planning the Lua Workshop 2012. Please sign up if you're interested.

item.title: Lua 5.1.5 released
item.description: Lua 5.1.5 has been released. It applies all patches for Lua 5.1.4.

item.title: Lua wins Front Line Award 2011
item.description: Lua won the Front Line Award 2011 from Game Developers Magazine in the category Programming Tools.

item.title: Lua 5.2.0 released
item.description: The first release of Lua 5.2 is now ready.

item.title: Lua 5.2.0 is almost here
item.description: We have entered the final release-candidate cycle for Lua 5.2.0.

item.title: Roberto visits Stanford
item.description: Roberto Ierusalimschy, the chief architect of Lua, will be visiting Stanford University for three months on a Tinker Professorship starting in January 2012.

item.title: Lua Workshop 2011 held in Switzerland
item.description: The Lua Workshop 2011 was held in Switzerland.

item.title: Lua 5.2.0 (beta) released
item.description: The beta version of Lua 5.2 is now available for testing.

item.title: Lua enters the top 10 languages of the TIOBE index
item.description: Lua enters the top 10 languages of the TIOBE index for the first time.

item.title: Lua article in ACM Queue
item.description: The article "Passing a Language through the Eye of a Needle" has appeared in ACM Queue.

item.title: Lua Workshop 2011 to be held in Switzerland
item.description: The Lua Workshop 2011 will be held in Frick, Switzerland on September 8-9.

item.title: Lua is approaching the top 10 of the TIOBE index
item.description: Lua is approaching the top 10 languages of the TIOBE Programming Community Index.

item.title: Reference manual now available in German
item.description: The Lua 5.1 reference manual has been translated into German.

item.title: Initial plans for the Lua Workshop 2011
item.description: We have started planning the Lua Workshop 2011. Please sign up if you're interested.

item.title: Lua 5.2.0 (alpha) released
item.description: The alpha version of Lua 5.2 is now available for testing.

item.title: Lua 5.2.0 (work5) released
item.description: The fifth work version of Lua 5.2 has been released for testing.

item.title: Social Media Press joins our corporate sponsorship program
item.description: Social Media Press has joined our corporate sponsorship program.

item.title: Mailing list has a new home
item.description: The mailing list has a new home at Pepperfish.

item.title: Scheduled maintenance at Lua.org
item.description: Short maintenance scheduled at Lua.org on 20 August. Mirror site at PUC-Rio activated during downtime.

item.title: Lua 5.2 (work4) released.
item.description: The fourth work version of Lua 5.2 has been released for testing.

item.title: Lua 5.2 (work3) released
item.description: The third work version of Lua 5.2 has been released for testing.

item.title: CSTUG joins our corporate sponsorship program
item.description: The Czechoslovak TeX Users Group has joined our corporate sponsorship program.

item.title: Lua Programming Gems now available as an e-book
item.description: The book "Lua Programming Gems" is now available as an e-book through Feisty Duck.

item.title: Roberto talks about Lua at Stanford
item.description: Roberto Ierusalimschy, the chief architect of Lua, will talk tomorrow at the Stanford EE Computer Systems Colloquium about the design of Lua or "Small is Beautiful".

item.title: Tutorial on Lua scripting in game production at GDC 2010
item.description: A full-day tutorial on Lua scripting in game production will be given today at the Game Developers Conference in San Francisco.

item.title: Adobe joins our corporate sponsorship program
item.description: Adobe Systems has joined our corporate sponsorship program.

item.title: Lua forums
item.description: The Lua web forums have a new home, courtesy of Stefan Peters.

item.title: Programming in Lua now available as an e-book
item.description: The book "Programming in Lua" (2nd edition) is now available as an e-book through Feisty Duck.

item.title: Lua 5.2 (work2) released
item.description: The second work version of Lua 5.2 has been released for testing.

item.title: Lua 5.2 (work1) released
item.description: The first work version of Lua 5.2 has been released for testing.

item.title: Tutorial on Lua scripting in game production at GDC 2010
item.description: A full-day tutorial on Lua scripting in game production will be given at the Game Developers Conference in San Francisco on Tuesday, March 9th 2010.

item.title: Lua store opens at Zazzle
item.description: You can help to spread the word about Lua by buying Lua products at Zazzle and CafePress. Use Lua, wear Lua!

item.title: Lua Workshop 2009 held in Rio de Janeiro
item.description: The Lua Workshop 2009 was held at PUC-Rio in Rio de Janeiro.

item.title: Created Lua BR
item.description:
Lua BR é a versão brasileira da lista de Lua. Todos são bem vindos!
Lua BR is the brazilian version of lua-l. The primary language of Lua BR is meant to be Portuguese. Everyone is welcome.

item.title: Ansca announces the Corona SDK based on Lua
item.description: Ansca has announced the Corona SDK for writing native iPhone applications in Lua.

item.title: Google's Android Scripting Environment supports Lua
item.description: Google introduces the Android Scripting Environment with support for Lua.

item.title: Lua Workshop 2009 announced
item.description: This year the Lua Workshop will be held in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, on October 6-7, 2009.

item.title: "Concepts of Programming Languages" discusses Lua
item.description: The 9th edition of the book "Concepts of Programming Languages" includes sections on Lua and a brief interview with Roberto.

item.title: Scheduled maintenance at Lua.org
item.description: Short maintenance scheduled at Lua.org on 15 April. Mirror site at PUC-Rio activated during downtime.

item.title: Interview to appear in "Masterminds of Programming"
item.description: The book "Masterminds of Programming: Conversations with the Creators of Major Programming Languages" includes an interview with the Lua team.

item.title: Reference manual now available in Hungarian
item.description: The Lua 5.1 reference manual has been translated into Hungarian.

item.title: "Lua Programming Gems" published
item.description: The book "Lua Programming Gems" has been published.

item.title: Roberto interviewed in Computerworld
item.description: Roberto Ierusalimschy, the chief architect of Lua, was interviewed about Lua in Computerworld's "The A-Z of Programming Languages" series.

item.title: Lua 5.1.4 released
item.description: Lua 5.1.4 has been released. It fixes all known bugs in Lua 5.1.3.

item.title: New corporate sponsor
item.description: TYPO3 (AOE media) has joined our corporate sponsorship program.

item.title: New corporate sponsorship program
item.description: We have launched a corporate sponsorship program for the Lua project and Océ is our first corporate sponsor.

item.title: Roberto talks about Lua at JAOO 2008
item.description: Roberto Ierusalimschy, the chief architect of Lua, will talk at the JAOO Australia conference in Brisbane and Sydney.

item.title: Chinese translation of "Programming in Lua" published
item.description: A Chinese translation of the book "Programming in Lua" has been published.

item.title: Patch for Lua 5.1.3 released
item.description: A patch file fixing all known bugs in Lua 5.1.3 is now available.

item.title: Reference manual now available in Russian
item.description: The Lua 5.1 reference manual has been translated into Russian.

item.title: Live Lua demo now available
item.description: You can now try Lua directly in your browser.

item.title: Lua 5.1.3 released
item.description: Lua 5.1.3 has been released. It fixes all known bugs in Lua 5.1.2.

item.title: "Introductory Lua programming" published
item.description: The book "Introductory Lua programming" by Yutaka Ueno has been published (in Japanese).

item.title: Reference manual now available in Spanish
item.description: The Lua 5.1 reference manual has been translated into Spanish.

item.title: Lua Workshop 2008 to be held in Washington, D.C.
item.description: Lua Workshop 2008 to be held at George Washington University in Washington, D.C.

item.title: Reference manual now available in Portuguese
item.description: The Lua 5.1 reference manual has been translated into Portuguese. O manual de referência de Lua 5.1 foi traduzido para o português.

item.title: "Traveling light, the Lua way" appears in IEEE Software.
item.description: The article "Traveling light, the Lua way" by Ashwin Hirschi of Reflexis has appeared in IEEE Software.

item.title: Lua climbs to position 15 in the TIOBE Index
item.description: Lua has climbed from position 18 to position 15 in the TIOBE Programming Community Index.

item.title: Workshop on LuaTeX held at TUG 2007
item.description: A workshop on LuaTeX, an extended version of pdfTeX that embeds Lua, was held at the TUG 2007, the 28th Annual Meeting of the TeX Users Group.

item.title: Lua climbs to position 18 in the TIOBE Index
item.description: Lua has climbed from position 21 to position 18 in the TIOBE Programming Community Index.

item.title: Korean translation of "Programming in Lua" published
item.description: A Korean translation of the book "Programming in Lua" has been published by Insight.

item.title: Article on Lua at ACM HOPL III
item.description: The paper "The Evolution of Lua" was presented at the Third ACM SIGPLAN History of Programming Languages Conference (HOPL III).

item.title: Article on Lua in IEEE Software
item.description: The article "Traveling light, the Lua way" by Ashwin Hirschi will appear in the IEEE Software special issue on Rapid Application Development with Dynamically Typed Languages (September/October 2007).

item.title: Article on Lua in Linux Journal
item.description: The article "A Look at Lua" by Joseph Quigley will appear in the June 2007 issue of the Linux Journal.

item.title: Lua 5.1.2 released
item.description: Lua 5.1.2 released, fixing all known bugs in Lua 5.1.

item.title: Lua climbs to position 25 in the TIOBE Index
item.description: Lua has climbed from position 44 to position 25 in the TIOBE Programming Community Index.

item.title: Mailing list turns 10
item.description: The Lua mailing list is now 10 years old.

item.title: Abstracts selected for Lua Programming Gems
item.description: 43 abstracts have been selected for Lua Programming Gems.

item.title: Call for contributions to Lua Programming Gems
item.description: Contributions to a book on Lua Programming Gems are solicited.

item.title: German translation of Programming in Lua published
item.description: A German translation of the book "Programming in Lua" has been published.

item.title: Lua enters top 50 in TIOBE index
item.description: Lua has entered the top 50 in the TIOBE Programming Community Index.

item.title: Reference manual available as book
item.description: The reference manual for Lua 5.1 is now available as a book.

item.title: Lua Workshop 2006 official page
item.description: Created official page for the Lua Workshop 2006

item.title: Lua 5.0.3 released
item.description: Lua 5.0.3 released, fixing all known bugs in Lua 5.0.2.

item.title: Lua 5.1.1 released
item.description: Lua 5.1.1 released, fixing all known bugs in Lua 5.1.

item.title: DistroWatch donation
item.description: Lua elected for DistroWatch May 2006 donation.

item.title: PIL2
item.description: Second edition of "Programming in Lua" by Roberto Ierusalimschy published.

item.title: Lua 5.1
item.description: Lua 5.1 released.

item.title: Lua Workshop 2006
item.description: Lua Workshop 2006 to be held at the Océ R&D site in Venlo (NL).
